::Battera::

She walked a little closer to the ship.  She had to talk to someone 
from the Maximal side as Vulois instructed to do.  She kept going 
untill she came to the tree just outside of the ship.  She figured 
that she was just out of the range of the autoguns.  She tried her 
scanner again but it wouldn't read. She hit it against the 
tree, "Work damn you, work." She hit it a few more times and looked 
at it. It was working again. "Holy Cybertron, it worked? I should use 
that technique on other stuff." She checked the scanner again.  this 
time it showed a Maximal near her. "Alright." she said in  hushed 
voice to herself.
